text: Woe to Jerusalem
Ah! Ariel, Ariel, \add the\add* city \add where\add* David encamped!
Add year to year,
let festivals recur.
Yet\f + \fr 29:2 \ft Or “And” \f* I will inflict Ariel,
and there shall be mourning and lamentation,
and it shall be to me like an altar hearth.\f + \fr 29:2 \ft Hebrew “Ariel,” which might mean “altar hearth” \f*
And I will encamp ⸤in a circle⸥\f + \fr 29:3 \ft The Hebrew text literally reads “like the ball”; the LXX supports an emendation to “David” \f* against you,
and I will lay siege to you \add with\add* towers\f + \fr 29:3 \ft Hebrew “tower” \f*
and I will raise up siegeworks against you.
Then\f + \fr 29:4 \ft Or “And” \f* you shall be low;
you shall speak from \add the\add* earth,
and your words\f + \fr 29:4 \ft Hebrew “word” \f* will be low, from dust.
And your voice will be from \add the\add* earth, like a ghost,
and your word will whisper from \add the\add* dust.
But\f + \fr 29:5 \ft Or “And” \f* the multitude of your strangers shall be like fine dust,
and \add the\add* multitude of tyrants like chaff that passes by.
And it will happen \add in\add* an instant, suddenly.
You will be punished by Yahweh of hosts
with thunder and earthquake and great sound,
storm wind and tempest and \add the\add* flame of a devouring fire.
And the multitude of all the nations who fight against Ariel,
all those who fight \add against\add* her and her stronghold,
and those who inflict her shall be like \add a\add* dream, a vision of \add the\add* night.
And it shall be as when the hungry person dreams—look, \add he is\add* eating!
And he wakes up and his inner self \add is\add* empty.
Or\f + \fr 29:8 \ft Or “And” \f* as when the thirsty person dreams—look, \add he is\add* drinking!
And he wakes up and look, \add he is\add* faint,
and his inner self \add is\add* longing for water.
So shall be the multitude of all the nations who fight against Mount Zion.
Be astonished and be amazed!
Blind yourselves and be blinded!
They are drunk but\f + \fr 29:9 \ft Or “and” \f* not \add from\add* wine;
they stagger but\f + \fr 29:9 \ft Or “and” \f* not \add from\add* strong drink.
For Yahweh has poured out upon you a spirit of deep sleep,
and he has shut your eyes, the prophets,
and he has covered your heads, the seers.

And the vision of all this has become for you like \add the\add* words of \add a\add* sealed document. When they give it to one who knows the\f + \fr 29:11 \ft The reading tradition (\fqa Qere \ft ) has “a” instead of “the” \f* document, saying, “⸤Read⸥\f + \fr 29:11 \ft Literally “Call” \f* this now!” He says, “I am not able, for it \add is\add* sealed.”

And \add if\add* the document is given to \add one\add* who does not ⸤know how to read⸥,\f + \fr 29:12 \ft Literally “know a document” \f* saying, “⸤Read⸥\f + \fr 29:12 \ft Literally “Call” \f* this now!” he says, “I do not ⸤know how to read⸥.”\f + \fr 29:12 \ft Literally “know a document” \f*
And the Lord said,
“Because this people draw near with its mouth,
and with its lips it honors me,
and its heart is far from me,
and their fear of me is a commandment of men that has been taught,
therefore look, I am again doing something spectacular
and a spectacle with this spectacular people.
And the wisdom of its wise men shall perish,
and the discernment of its discerning ones shall keep itself hidden.”
Ah! Those who make a plan deep, to hide \add it\add* from Yahweh,
and their deeds are\f + \fr 29:15 \ft The Hebrew is singular \f* in a dark place.
And they say, “Who sees us?
And who knows us?”
Your perversity!
As if ⸤a potter⸥\f + \fr 29:16 \ft Literally “of the one who creates” \f* shall be regarded as \add the\add* clay!
That \add the\add* product of its maker \add says\add*,
“He did not make me,”
and \add the\add* thing made into shape says of its ⸤potter⸥,\f + \fr 29:16 \ft Literally “one who creates” \f*
“He has no understanding.”
Blessing after Punishment
⸤In a very little while⸥\f + \fr 29:17 \ft Literally “Not still a trifling \fq of time \ft ” \f* shall not Lebanon change into \add a\add* fruitful land,
and the fruitful land be regarded as \add a\add* forest?
And on that day, the deaf shall hear \add the\add* words of a scroll,
and \add the\add* eyes of \add the\add* blind shall see out of gloom and darkness.
And \add the\add* meek ⸤have joy after joy⸥\f + \fr 29:19 \ft Literally “shall add joy” \f* in Yahweh,
and \add the\add* needy of \add the\add* people shall rejoice in the holy one of Israel.
For \add the\add* tyrant shall be no more,
and \add the\add* scoffer shall come to an end.
And all those lying in wait for evil shall be cut off;
those who mislead a person into sin with a word
and set a trap for the ⸤arbitrator⸥\f + \fr 29:21 \ft Literally “one who argues” \f* in the gate
and guide away \add the\add* righteous by emptiness.
Therefore Yahweh, who redeemed Abraham, says this to the house of Jacob:
“Jacob will no longer be ashamed,
and his face will no longer grow pale.
For when he sees his children,
the work of my hands, in his midst,
they will treat my name as holy,
and they will treat the holy one of Jacob as holy,
and they will stand in awe \add of\add* the God of Israel.
And those who err \add in\add* spirit will ⸤acquire⸥\f + \fr 29:24 \ft Literally “know” \f* understanding,
and those who grumble will learn instruction.
